articles.author: Helen Davidson
articles.title: Rumours swirl after Xi Jinping fails to give key Brics speech - The Guardian
articles.description: Xi was due to address high profile forum in South Africa, but instead his speech was read out by his commerce minister
articles.content:
Chinas leader, Xi Jinping, unexpectedly skipped a scheduled speech at a key multilateral business forum in South Africa on Tuesday.
Xi arrived in Johannesburg for the Brics summit on Monday evening … [+2894 chars]

articles.author: India Today World Desk
articles.title: Watch: Xi Jinping left puzzled at BRICS after aide stopped abruptly by security - India Today
articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping's aide encountered a security hurdle when attempting to join the premier and gain access to a hall at the 15th BRICS Summit in South Africa's Johannesburg.
articles.content: An aide of Chinese President, Xi Jinping, was stopped by security officials when he was trying to catch up with the president and enter a hall during the 15th BRICS summit which is currently going on… [+1261 chars]
